sentences.sContent: The reality-based show followed the unorthodox lives of Ozzy, his wife Sharon, daughter Kelly, and son, Jack.
sentences.sCn: 这个写实剧取材于奥兹、其妻莎伦、女儿凯莉和儿子杰克的另类生活。

synos.tran: 非正统的；异端的；异教的

trans.tranCn: 非正统的；异端的；异教的
trans.tranOther: unorthodox opinions or methods are different from what is usual or accepted by most people
